duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead and manage multi-discipline team for water and wastewater projects including ultra-pure water, drinking water systems, and wastewater treatment.
Effectively communicate water and wastewater design concepts to clients and participate in project scoping activities.
Establish strong, productive internal collaborative relationships with senior management.
Supervise staff and subcontractors to successfully deliver technical projects and build/mentor staff in the group.
Coordinate with clients to ensure an ongoing positive relationship and participation in proposal presentations.

education_certification.credential: B.S. in Civil, Mechanical, Environmental, or Chemical Engineering.
Professional Engineering license with the ability to obtain Ohio license within 6 months of start date.
